item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello World!!! Wait!! Is it mandatory to say Hello World, every time you make a new blog,then certainly yes. Anyways let me start by saying something which probabaly no one will ever be reading on the Internet. Yes I am sure, it requires efforts to read, that’s why very few people read and write (is that so?) Yeap it requires lots and lots of efforts that’s why not writing, lazy me.
